name: Fruit Jam - a Frutastic Fun Puzzle Game!
name_original: Fruit Jam - a Frutastic Fun Puzzle Game!
description:
Connect and blow up chains of fruits to solve challenging levels in this deliciously addictive puzzle game! Try it out and see the hottest new game that everybody's talking about today!

------------------------------------

Fruit Jam Features:

• Simple to learn, hard to master!
• Tasty and fun fruit graphics!
• 4 unique puzzle modes!
• 100 levels with challenging obstacles and more to come!
• Earn special fruits and bonuses to blow up even more fruit!


Note: This game requires iOS 7 to play
